section.name: Document Types
section.p: Document types describe how your content is edited and stored. This section describes how to customize or create your own types through the Hippo CMS user interface.

ul.li: The Document Type Editor - Introduction of the document type editing interface, through which you create and maintain your document types.
Tutorial - Learn how to create your own document type step by step.
Examples - See examples of a wide variety of document types.
Field Types Reference - Overview of all the field types you can use in your document types.
Advanced Document Types - Go beyond the possibilities of the document type editor and create advanced types, you own field types, etc.
